trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Westminster
There were no other sightings in Westminster on or around April 17th 2004
Summary: saw object ''swim'' less than 5ft from me
divs: Sighting Detailsit was about 6pm,i walked out my front door with my wife vic..i rememberthinking that something was heading my way,[corner of my eye] first thought..dragonfly.. as i looked back to see..my life changed for the better cuz i saw something i wasn't meant to see. i hate to say this but this ''thing'' looked alot like the ufos from the movie the abyss. the edges where stingray like and it ''swam'' pass me i was struck by it's beautful grace,inside my brain i was going 100mph but as i look back i could't even shout to my wife ''look!!!! ireached to grab the car door and as i looked back to the object i could see it's too perfect round head ''scanning'' the ground. i think it was some type of machine as i got in my car i didn't even look to see if it went up, down, or just fade away. i know what i saw but it's not something people would belive i really don't care anymore,, call me crazy.....
